name: Loud Cloud the Bright Egg
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: Add 1 "Loud Cloud" card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished from the GY for the effect of a "Loud Cloud" card: Add 2 "Loud Cloud" monsters from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Loud Cloud the Bright Egg" once per turn.
